1.content:
Osaka felt a little strange after waking up from a dream that was more unusual than normal. She tried to recall the details of the dream but only comes up with "Something I ate last night gave me powers of some sort", which is very far from what had actually happened, at least as far as the "something I ate" part goes. Not that Osaka can actually remember what she did last night, mainly because she's Osaka.

At any rate, Osaka gets herself ready for class while wondering what kind of powers she had received. It's just as she finishes getting dressed that something crosses her mind. "Ah...that's no good. I forgot to get groceries...I guess that means no breakfast today." she says to herself. Then, her usual problem solving skills kick in. "Ah...it's a sunny day...maybe if I was a berry girl or something..." says Osaka as she starts to see herself as a blueberry girl. She doesn't even notice that she's starting to turn blue as she heads out with the thought still in her head. It's only when she starts to feel pressure build up that she notices something.

"Mmm...I think it might start out feeling something like that." Osaka says, not realizing that her waistline is actually swelling out until a few moments later. "Wait...what?" Looking down at the source of the pressure. "Ah...could turning into a berry girl in the sunlight be my power?" she says as she continues to bloat up until she's as wide as she is tall. "I wonder why a blueberry, though...that was the last thing I was thinking about..." she says, as her true power dawns on her. "Ah! I can change myself just by thinking about it!"

Osaka presses against herself and notes that she genuinely feels like a berry. "Ah...it's not an illusion either. I've really become a blueberry girl...looks like I'll be having breakfast after all." she says as she soaks up the sun.

-----------------

Some time later, Osaka is walking along after returning herself to normal. "Now I wonder...does this work on other people as well? Hehe...let's see if it'll work on my friends."
1.title: Introduction

choices: "I don't think I want to be a berry, though."
"I'd rather watch for now, if you don't mind."
"So this means you can give others your powers, right?"
11.content:
Osaka decides to play around with Chiyo first. She figures that Chiyo of all people would be the most willing to go along with being altered by Osaka's powers. It's not too much trouble to get Chiyo alone with her since they walk to school together every day.

"Hehe, good morning, Osaka. You seem to be in a good mood today. Is something happening today?" asks Chiyo when the meet up.

Osaka nods. "You could say that, Chiyo-chan. But would you rather I tell you, or show you?"

"Well, it would probably be quicker if you showed me, so go ahead." replies Chiyo. Expecting Osaka to actually give her something, she's pretty shocked to see her friend turn blue and bloat up before her very eyes. "W...was that supposed to happen?" Chiyo finally manages to say, still fairly bewildered.

"Yeah...I woke up with the power to do stuff like this to myself just by thinking about it. I guess I just like making myself into a blueberry. I think I could do anything I wanted to do to myself, though." Osaka explains.

Getting over her bewilderment, Chiyo walks up to Osaka and presses a hand against her. "How strange...it's practically a complete transformation. You certainly feel like a blueberry, anyway." She says. Just then, she sees her arm turn blue before her eyes. "Uhm...Osaka..." Chiyo says. Osaka looks over at her and immediately stops thinking of Chiyo as a blueberry girl.

"Ah, are you ok, Chiyo-chan?" asks Osaka.

Chiyo nods. "Ah, yeah, I'm fine." she says.
11.title: Chiyo

choices: However big they can get before class begins.
111.content:
Chiyo giggles a little. "You didn't have to stop, though. It looks nice enough, so I don't mind joining you." explains Chiyo.

"Eh he he...if you don't mind, then alright." Osaka says, as she resumes thinking about Chiyo as a blueberry. But what she doesn't mention is that she's actually thinking of Chiyo as a blueberry that's five times bigger than she is.

Bloating up for the first time, Chiyo starts to rub her surface "Mmmmm, being squishy like this feels wonderful..." she comments as her hands are pressed a few inches into her bloating midsection. Osaka nods in agreement.

Already wider than she is tall once she gets to the same size as Osaka, Chiyo is a little surprised to find herself continuing to grow. "Ah, Osaka-san, I'm still bloating up." Chiyo says.

"Hehe, you are, Chiyo-chan. Since you're so small I think you should be a bigger berry than everyone." Osaka explains. "Surprise!"

Chiyo smiles. "Alright, but would you mind at least being as big as me?" Chiyo asks. "I could really use the company."

Without saying anything, Osaka starts to bloat up until her size has matched up with Chiyo's. "We are best friends, so ok, let's be big blueberries together!" exclaims Osaka, which makes Chiyo giggle.

"So, how big are we talking about?" asks Chiyo, not really caring how big they get at the moment.
111.title: Blueberry Buddies

choices: Stop, but not until they're rediculously large.
Get their friends in on it, then bloat forever with them.
1113.content:
"Because I think I could just keep bloating like this forever." says Chiyo, caught up in the moment.

Osaka goes along with this because she's Osaka. "I like the way you think, Chiyo-chan. Let's do just that, then!" she exclaims.

Chiyo smiles a bit. "Well, I wasn't completely serious, but it does sound fun..." she says, figuring this might be her last chance to reconsider.
1113.title: Should we even stop?

choices: Merge together as one massive blueberry.
Go all the way with the transformation and just be giant blueberries.
11131.content:
Chiyo giggles. "Alright, let's do it, then. It might be only the two of us, but I can't think of a single person I'd rather grow large with." Chiyo says as she squishes up against Osaka.

"You said it, Chiyo-chan. This way, we'll absolutely be able to spend the rest of our days together." replies Osaka "Maybe even the rest of time."

Osaka's last statement makes Chiyo sigh happily. "Mmmmmmm! I didn't realize that until just now...now I KNOW I want to go through with this!" she says excitedly. "Just the thought of the two of us literally bloating forever as blueberries...I can barely contain myself!"

"Ah..our heads will be pretty far apart...what should we do about that?" Osaka asks as the pair reaches 100 feet wide.
11131.title: Forever, Really

111311.content:
“Maybe we could merge together?” asked Chio and immediately she got her answer as her and Osaka’s body started to come together.

“Oooooh Chio-chan it feels so good.” Osaka moaned as their bodies pushed together more forcefully and soon the two bodies where one with two heads blue heads on top. Still they continued to grow.
111311.title: One blueberry two heads.

choices: Make a place for them to hang out.
Literally press the world flat in a cartoonish fashion.
1113111.content:
Chiyo giggles, and nuzzles her head against Osaka's, who then gladly returns the favor. "So, Osaka, if we're going to be growing like this, do you think we might want to go someplace where we won't do so much damage?"

Osaka thinks for a moment. "Ah...I'm not sure...does a place like that even exist?"

"Hehe, you tell me, Osaka. You could probably will some place like that into existence if you wanted to." explains Chiyo. "Or we could stay here and keep squishing things as we grow."

On one hand, the idea of Chiyo and Osaka having their own corner of the multiverse sounds fun, but on the other hand, the thought of flattening everything starts to enter into Osaka's head.
1113111.title: Growing forever.

1113112.content:
Bigger and bigger they grew. They quickly outgrew Japan and dipped into the ocean. “OOOh its cold” said Chio their body quivering.

“We better get used to it cus soon well be all over it” said Osaka giggling. They continued to grow soon rivaling the size of the moon.

“Where getting so big I can’t see the ground” said Chio looking down.

“That’s because where floating” said Osaka looking up and seeing the ground “guess we where too big for gravity”

Soon they have there own gravity pulling in the moon it crashes into their bulbous flesh causing them to ooh as it is added to there flesh.

As they grow they pull in more and more earth Mars asteroid belt Venus Mercury all added to their mass causing immense pleasure. Soon they outgrow the sun and pull it into them the heat feels good in the cold nothing ness of space.

The Milky Way disappeared and soon all that surrounded it as well. Until there was nothing left but the Osaka/Chio berry.
“ It feels so good to be together like this,” moaned Osaka in pleasure. “But it seems there is nothing left to compare us too.”

“you know when a star gets too big it normally collapses in on itself making a huge explosion.” Said Chio “although we have definitely gotten bigger than any star ever has been.”

“Hmmm I bet exploding would feel good” thought Osaka

Immediately Osaka/Chio feel there body move off in all different directions they can feel every shred of blue skin every drop of juice as it flies away and it felt amazing.

Afterwards the cosmos was reformed ready to start over again apparently the big bang was a pair of schoolgirls who became bigger than space itself.
1113112.title: Big Berry Bang!

11132.content:
Chiyo shakes her head. "I don't really want to bloat up forever, but I wouldn't mind ending up incredibly large and staying that way. I definitely want to end up bigger than a mile, though. That is, if you don't mind leaving me as a massive blueberry, Osaka-san."

"A mega-sized blueberry for a friend sounds great. Don't worry, Chiyo-chan, you just tell me how big you want to be and I'll make sure you get that big." replies Osaka, eager to make herself and her friend much larger.

Chiyo giggles a little and starts thinking it over.
11132.title: Let's be big instead.

112.content:
"But do you think I can be a blackberry instead of a blueberry? You know, so we're not exactly the same." says Chiyo.

Osaka nods, and starts changing the little girl into a blackberry girl instead. She bloats up very similarly to how she would bloat into a blueberry, only instead of her clothes beings stained blue they're stained a dark redish-purple color. As for Chiyo herself, her skin starts to take on a similar, though her body grows much darker as she bloats up. Very soon, Chiyo has the blackberry color and size down, but not the appearance. Nonetheless, Chiyo does seem to be enjoying herself.

She giggles a little. "Well, you've got most of it, but I'm still not quite a blackberry..." says Chiyo.

Osaka nods. "I'm just wondering what part of you I should make into the bulbs..." she says, intend on making one of Chiyo's extremities into the pods that make up a blackberry's surface.
112.title: Something's missing...

choices: Continue on and make her a complete blackberry.
1122.content:
Before Chiyo can wonder what Osaka could be thinking about, she feels things begin to sprout out of her round body. She looks down to see that her body has been sprouting a great number of extra feet, much to her surprise. "Osaka, why are you making me sprout feet like this!?" shouts Chiyo as her extra sets of feet start to take up her entire body all the way up to in front of her face.

Osaka smiles. "Feet are pretty sensitive, you know. They'll make for great bulbs since it'll feel so nice when they're all round and being rubbed against stuff as you roll around." Osaka explains, before something else pops in her mind. She notes that Chiyo's body is currently completely obscured by her wiggling feet, and starts to feel if she should just leave Chiyo as-is.
1122.title: A blackberry or...

choices: Play around with each other like this.
11222.content:
"Ah, something about having all those feet covering you makes you look really cute, Chiyo-chan. Do you mind if I leave them like that? It really is a nice look for you." says Osaka, as she looks Chiyo over.

Chiyo wriggles her many feet around a bit. "Oooh, alright. I think I'm actually starting to like this, anyway. I'm like...some kind of footberry!" Chiyo says, giggling about it.

"That's a good name for it, Chiyo-chan, let's stick with that, then. I think I'll be a footberry too." Osaka focuses, and she starts to bloat up with blackberry juice. As she bloats, she makes one row of feet emerge, then another, then another, until her entire round surface is covered with feet much like Chiyo's, only Osaka has quite a few more. It's at this moment that Osaka notices that Chiyo's feet just happen to be the same size as hers, despite Osaka being the taller of the two. It would appear Chiyo is now aware of this too, as she appears to be embarrassed a little by this.

A gentle grin crosses Osaka's face. "Ah, I didn't know you had big feet Chiyo-chan."

With a nervous giggle, Chiyo blushes a bit more, her face turning a dark purple. "Ehehe, it's a little embarrassing for me, it's always been so weird for me."

"Ah, but we're very weird right now, aren't we?" reasons Osaka.

Osaka saying this causes Chiyo's embarrassment to subside. "Yeah, that's true! And being like this is pretty nice, so...being weird is nice!" exclaims Chiyo, giggling quite a bit.

"Good, because I want things to be even weirder, Chiyo-chan." It would seem that Osaka has something in mind now.
11222.title: Together in Weirdness

112221.content:
Without warning, Osaka rolls herself over to Chiyo and squishes up against her, which causes many of their feet to press up against each other. While surprised at first, Chiyo seems to enjoy how it feels to have Osaka's feet pressing against her own. "Oh wow, this feels really nice, Osaka..." Chiyo says, as she squishes herself against Osaka too.

"Alright, Chiyo-Chan, I think I have a couple of things we can do. Either we can play with each other's feet now, get bigger and then play with each other's feet." explains Osaka.
112221.title: Foot Press

1122212.content:
"Ahh...what do you mean by bigger?" Chiyo asks curiously.

This seems to have Osaka stumped a little. "Ah...we'd be bigger berries, with bigger feet. Then again, having a lot more feet would be nice too..."
1122212.title: Volume vs. Quantity

choices: Roll around, enjoy how it feels.
Get right to the foot play.
11222122.content:
Chiyo grins. "Ah...having bigger feet sounds especially weird, so let's go for that, then!"

--------

After getting to a more open area where they'd have room to grow, Osaka makes the two of them grow into larger footberries.

Rubbing a couple of her feet together helps Chiyo get a feel for how big they are. "Oh, nice...they're getting a lot bigger than I expected!"

Osaka nods, and wiggles her feet as their bodies grow. She gets carried away however, as she keeps making them bloat and grow until each of their feet are the size of a car, leaving the girls themselves somewhere above 100 feet tall.

"Ah, a bit too big...but that's even better." Osaka says this while she tries moving her car-sized feet about, finding she's still able to move decently enough to play with Chiyo. She goes back to squishing against Chiyo. "Eeeeee...that simply feels wonderful...I bet rolling around would feel great too. Oooh, maybe we should do that first so we're more into it when we get around to our foot playing?"
11222122.title: Big Feet, Bigger Girls

choices: Mold her as-is, anything is possible, after all.
113.content:
Chiyo smiles. "But, while I can be a berry, I could probably have a lot of other things done to me too. After all, you can practically do anything you want with your mind, why just limit it to making me into a fruit?" she asks.

Osaka nods. "Ah...but what would you like to be or have done to you?"

"Ah, I don't really know, now that I think about it, it does sound like a lot of fun just thinking about it, though..." Chiyo says, giggling a little, as Osaka returns her to her usual state.

As Osaka says this, she starts by thinking of making Chiyo into an easier to manipulate form...
113.title: Endless Possibilities...

1132.content: Without warning, Chiyo starts to feel like she's becoming a lot less stable. She looks down and realizes that whatever Osaka is doing to her, it's causing her to melt. Or at least, it seems like she's melting, but in reality Chiyo feels like she's already made entirely out of what Osaka wanted to turn her into, so only the forces of nature are causing her to melt. Chiyo realizes she has enough control over her body to still move about, so she pulls at herself to see what kind of material she's been made into.
1132.title: Gooey Chiyo

choices: Make it so Chiyo can produce jelly.
11323.content:
Chiyo manages to pull a chunk out of herself, which would seem to make her some sort of jelly-like substance. However, she was clear and white, so she has no idea what kind of jelly she is made of. "Ah, Osaka, what kind of Jelly am I supposed to be?"

"Oh! Ah...how about grape?" asks Osaka, which causes Chiyo to turn to a purple color.

Looking herself over, Chiyo stretches herself out so that she's back to her normal height, with everything below her waist simply being a mass of jelly, since it makes it easier for Chiyo to maintain her shape. However, all this talk about food is making Osaka hungry, and with Chiyo being composed of jelly is making her look rather tempting. She approaches Chiyo with a hungry look in her eye. Chiyo gasps as Osaka draws nearer. "Wait, I think I have an idea that will solve your problems!" exclaims Chiyo.
11323.title: Jelly

113231.content:
"Maybe if you were made of food, you'd stop being hungry? You know what goes good with jelly, right?" asks Chiyo.

It seems that Osaka understands, as she focuses. In moments, Osaka's entire body turns into smooth peanut butter. "Ah, you're right, Chiyo-chan, I'm not hungry at all now." says Osaka, as she smiles.

Chiyo nods, and slides over to Osaka. "Ahh...so now that we're like this, is there anything you'd like to do, Osaka? If not, I think I might have a couple suggestions of my own."
113231.title: Osaka Butter & Chiyo Jelly

choices: Complete transfer that leaves Osaka powerless.
Both Chiyo and Osaka have mental manipulation now.
115.content:
"This means you could possibly give your powers to someone else, right Osaka? That could make things complicated..." asks Chiyo.

Osaka thinks about this for a moment. "Ah, that's a good point...hey, I could let you have my powers too. That might be fun."

Chiyo blinks. "I don't know what I'd do with them, but it's up to you, Osaka."

Osaka gives a nod and thinks about Chiyo obtaining her powers too.
115.title: Does Chiyo get powers?

choices: Stick with the fruit girl angle.
1151.content:
Chiyo feels a quick surge of energy as Osaka manages to pull of the process. Osaka then tries to think of herself being back to normal, but finds that it isn't working. "Hehe, I think I overdid it, Chiyo. I can't seem to make anything happen now."

"Well...let's see if I can, at least..." says Chiyo, as she tries just returning Osaka to normal to test it out. Sure enough, Chiyo is able to pull it off and Osaka is back to normal in a matter of moments. "Wow, I wasn't expecting it to go that fast..." Chiyo comments.

Osaka giggles. "Hehe, ok, let's see what weird stuff you can come up with then." She says, as Chiyo takes a moment to think about it.
1151.title: So Should We Change The Title?

11512.content:
Chiyo smiles. "Ah, I've got it!" exclaims Chiyo as she gets a thought in her head. Soon, the two of them start to emit a hissing noise. "We're going to become a pair of big balloons!"

"Ah...so are we going to float away like balloons too?" Osaka asks dreamily, the scenario already playing out in her head.

For a moment, Chiyo considers this. "Well...let's see how things go first, Osaka." She finally says, not wanting to commit to a decision just yet. Especially since they're just now swollen to the point where their midsections are stretching out other parts of their body.
11512.title: Roundness without the berryness.

choices: Go with what's she has planned.
115122.content:
Osaka finds her limbs swelling up quickly as the expansion gets to the base of them, and the same is happening for Chiyo, though she's far from just finding this out. Chiyo smiles as she actively shapes their bodies, making them a more balloon-like shape than the almost completely spherical shape their bodies would normally take. Osaka takes a look at Chiyo to see what will soon happen to her, and is amazed to see that her neck has swollen up to the point where it is completely even with her surface. And as the same starts to happen to Osaka, Chiyo's head begins to swell out as well, her smiling face stretching as her entire head joins with the smooth surface that is her body. As Osaka's head goes though this process, Osaka notes that the only part of them that isn't inflated is their hands and feet...and that they look very balloon-like at this point.

"Wow, you really made us into balloons, Chiyo-Chan!" exclaims Osaka.

To this, Chiyo nods a bit. "Well, we are pretty close to being balloons at this point, which is why I thought this form would be a nice." she explains. "Though, maybe we could..." starts Chiyo, as she contemplates what she'll do at this point.
115122.title: Focus on accuracy.

1151222.content:
Chiyo giggles. "Oh no, Osaka, we're not exactly balloons yet, but since we're this far along, let's just see how much further along we can go." With that, even their hands and feet start to join with the rest of their body.

"Ahhh...I can feel it already, Chiyo-chan...every little bit of me feels like a smooth, flat surface...this must be how a balloon feels...it's really nice." comments Osaka, as within moments the last bits of her fingers and toes go flat against her surface.

Chiyo smiles. "Hehe, there...we're as close to balloons as people can possibly get." Chiyo says, before a thought crosses her mind that could let her take this even further than she already has.
1151222.title: Balloon-Girls...

choices: Become the size of normal balloons.
11512221.content:
"Though, don't you think that with this power we might as well drop the 'people' part?" asks Chiyo.

Osaka grins dreamily, and nods as well as a balloon-girl can. "Ah, I like to think I'm a balloon sometimes. It'll be nice to actually be one for a while." Osaka replies, then adding. "I want to be a green balloon, Chiyo-chan"

This makes Chiyo giggle a bit. She then decides what color she's going to make herself and then proceeds to imagine them both as balloons. Every color that makes up their surface starts to become their desired surface color, with Osaka becoming green and Chiyo becoming a dark magenta color. Their entire surface completely smooths out as they completely become one color and develops a rubbery shine, and they even produce a tied nozzle with a strong string attached. Chiyo also makes sure that the strings are tied to each other so they don't get separated from each other. They still have eyes and a mouth, though they look like they're just drawn on with a marker when they're not talking.

"Oooh...it feels like what I always imagined it would feel like, Chiyo-chan, only bigger." says Osaka, noting that they're still human-sized.
11512221.title: Girl-Balloons Now.

choices: "Let's turn everyone in school into balloons too."
115122212.content:
"Can we be only as big as balloons, too, Chiyo-chan?" ask Osaka. Chiyo complies without saying a word, and the two girl-balloons are shrunken down until they're no more than a foot tall. "Ahh...much better." says Osaka with a contented sigh.

Chiyo smiles. "Well, now that we're both balloons, is there anything you really want to do?"

Osaka gets a dreamy smile on her face. "Mmmhum...let's stay this way forever...I don't want to go back to being human anymore...and I want Chiyo-chan with me too."

Chiyo is rather surprised at Osaka's desire for both of them to remain balloons, though after thinking about it a bit she realizes she's become rather accustomed to being a girl-balloon too, especially after all the work she had to do to get them both to this point. "That won't be a problem, Osaka-san. I really like being like this, too." Chiyo says with a giggle.

"Ah, thank you, Chiyo-chan...now then..." starts Osaka, about to propose their next course of action.
115122212.title: They did go this far, after all.

choices: Mess with the size of people.
Mess with the shape of people.
11513.content: "Hum...no...less roundness..." contemplates Chiyo, as she continues to think.
11513.title: Enough Roundness For Now

choices: Go with a more die-like appearance.
115132.content:
"Hum...ok, how about this, Osaka?" says Chiyo, as she imagines something happening Osaka. Osaka soon finds herself painlessly bending over forwards, so much that the top of her head and the bottom of her shoes are both level. Thinking this would be enough for Chiyo, Osaka is surprised when she feels a force press on her from all sides, though even more from the top. While Osaka can't see what is going on due to her face being pressed into the ground, Chiyo watches as Osaka's entire body is pressed until it is in the shape of a one foot wide cube. Chiyo smiles and walks over to her, looking satisfied. "Yay, it really worked!" she exclaims, as she rolls Osaka until she's face-up. The side of her body with her face has her shoes and hands facing outwards as well, though they fold over along her other sides as if they folded upwards as Osaka was being squashed.

Osaka has a dreamy grin on her face. "Ah, so I've become a block." she says, for once not starring into space on her own.

Chiyo giggles. "Not what I was really thinking about, but I'll go with it...but now that I think about it..."
115132.title: Osaka The Cube

choices: Make Yomi fat to prove that she isn't normally fat.
Make Tomo fat so that she has no room to talk.
Use body inflation on both of them.
Turn both of them into something.
12.content:
Osaka encounters Tomo and Yomi on her way to school. They don't notice Osaka yet because they're too busy talking to each other, or rather, Tomo is too busy taking pokes a Yomi and Yomi is too busy deaing with Tomo.

Osaka decides it's a good idea to use her powers to try and calm them down.
12.title: Tomo + Yomi

123.content:
"Hm if I make Tomo big then she will have no room to talk." Osaka thought "But then Yomi would just make fun of Tomo." Osaka moved her hand to her chin in a thoughtful gesture then suddenly inspiration hits her. " I got it if I make them both big then they will both be happy!" She starts to think. "But how should I make them grow?"

"Seriously Tomo stop poking me I'm not heavy!" Yomi almost yelled her rage only emphasized by her glasses glinting in the sun. "Well maybe I wouldn’t poke you if you weren't so soft and squishy!" Replied Tomo laughing and poking Yomi again.

"I've got it!" thought Osaka "I'll fill them with...
123.title: Makes sense to me.

choices: Wanders off distracted by something or other.
Runs out and grabs onto one of them.
1231.content:
Hisssssss

" Hay what’s that noise?" Asked Tomo who stopped poking Yomi a moment to listen. "Sounds like a balloon being blown up." Yomi said as she pushed her glasses up the bridge of her nose. "Or the sound of your ballooning belly!" Laughed Tomo pointing at Yomi's belly poking out from under her shirt. "WHAT!" Yelled Yomi as she grabed hold of her basketball sized belly. Tomo, meanwhile, was laughing so hard she didn't notice that her belly was just as big.

"You're one to talk." Yomi say's pointing to Tomo's now beach ball sized belly. At first Tomo looked suprised but then she started to rub her belly and moan a little. " If being big feels this good then I could get used to it." Tomo says as inflation starts to spread to her butt and breasts stretching out her cloths. Yomi hadn’t noticed because she was so shoked but now that she thought about it, it did feel pretty good as her body ballooned out to match Tomo.

"Why didn't you tell me being big felt so good!' said Tomo as her arms and legs started to become conical. "You know I've never been anywhere near this big!" yelled Yomi as her arms started to sink into her body. "You are now." giggled Tomo as she became nothing but a ball with hands, feet, and a head. ”I guess your right.” agreed Yomi as she reached the same size.

It was then they both started to float off into the sky and Osaka-
1231.title: Osaka thinks about some big balloons.

12311.content:
The two of them still hardly notice Osaka before her voice suddenly pipes up. "Ah, I think I see Chiyo-chan" she says, as she wanders off after something that only vaguely resembles Chiyo.

Tomo and Yomi, though, are still fairly oblivious as to why they puffed up in the first place, though they do find it odd that Osaka hardly noticed their current state. They also start to wonder about how they'll be getting back to the ground.
12311.title: Mind Wanders and so does the Story.

choices: "I wonder what the others would look like big?"
12313.content:
"Wow there so big!" exclaimed Osaka. "To bad they’re floating away, the only way I could possibly catch them now is if I started to inflate too." As Osaka started to think of herself inflating she started to feel it happening. "Oh yea I can change myself too." she says in a sort of far away voice as her midsection bulges out. "But if I want to catch Yomi and Tomo I'm going to need to grow faster!"

FOOMP!

Osaka's body suddenly becomes a big ball and soon her arms and legs quickly being ingulfed by her rounding body. "Oooh I feel so full,” moans Osaka as she starts to float after the other two. "It seems we aren’t the only ones to get puffy" says Yomi as Osaka floats into view "Alright Osaka is here! Your almost as big as Yomi!" although this caused Yomi to glare at Tomo it just made Osaka giggle. "All joking aside." said Yomi reminding herself that size doesn’t really matter much at this point. " If this happened to us then I wonder if it could happen to the others."

"Hmmm" hmmed Osaka
12313.title: Osaka gets in on the action.

choices: Tomo is right Kaorin must be big too!
Something else is in store for Kaorin.
123131.content:
"OH YA Sakaki Would make a great big balloon!" Exclaimed Tomo and Osaka thought about.

Meanwhile in front of Sakaki's apartment Kaorin was pacing back and forth outside "I have to tell her today. I can't back down this time. Just tell her an--eep" Just as the door opens Kaorin dashes around the corner and Sakaki walks out sporting a large belly rubbing it and blushing. Peaking around the corner Kaorin fears the worst. "NOOOO HOW COULD THIS HAPPEN WHEN DID THIS HAPPEN?" Kaorin thought " No I have to calm down *sniff* if Sakaki has had relations with someone I have to support her."

Brushing the tears from her eyes she steps out from behind the corner to see an overall enlarged Sakaki. Her breasts where many sizes larger under which a belly that has grown even larger while her arms and legs have started to become round and puffy "Sakaki-san! What happened?"
"I don't know." Replied Sakaki in her usual quit voice. " I just started to inflate."
"what a relief." Thought Kaorin "She is not pregnant. Wait inflate?"
"I'm floating!" exclaimed Sakaki slightly worried as she reached ball shaped
"Don't worry I've got you!" yelled Kaorin as she put her arms around Sakaki's head laying on her to hold her down. It didn't work.

Back in the sky...

" You know even if Sakaki started expanding like us it's unlikely that she would appear over here." explained Yomi.
" Not if a special wind carried her to where we are." Said Osaka after a moment of thought.

"Where flying." Sakaki said calmly as a sudden gust of wind started to blow them in a different direction. Despite the worries Kaorin feels over her and Sakaki's situation she can't help but think, "I'm in bliss, I could die." as she hugged Sakaki as tightly as she could.

"What is that over there?" asked Yomi "Who is that over there?" asked Tomo
"O-ha Sakaki-san!" yelled Osaka waving her hand as much as she can.
"EEEEEEH? SHE REALLY APPERED!" yelled a shocked Yomi. "Is that Kaorin on her back?"
"Everyone is so big wha--" started Kaorin "EXCEPT YOU!" Interrupted Tomo suddenly enraged "YOU NEED TO BE BIG TOO YOU NEED TO BE BIG TOO!" she chanted wiggling her hands and feet as much as possible.
123131.title: Sakaki quietly appears, Kaorin too.

choices: Deflate that ego with something unexpected!
1231311.content:
"Tomo is right it's not safe for Kaorin to be small up here,” thought Osaka despite the fact Tomo hadn’t said anything like that. Soon both Sakaki and Kaorin noticed a change in Kaorin's body as her bloating tummy pushed against Sakaki's bloated body both of them blushed for there own reasons.
"Ah I’m starting to inflate!" exclaimed Kaorin to Yomi's shock and Tomo's amusement.
"Ha look at that I did it I have power over peoples bodies!" exclaimed Tomo excitedly
"You do not!" yelled an annoyed Yomi. "It's just a coincidence." by now Kaorin's body had started to catch up to her belly
"Ah I can't hang on much longer." Kaorin yelled franticly more concerned with holding onto Sakaki than her inflation.
"Grab my hand,” said Sakaki quietly. This made Kaorin blush feverishly.
"Miss Sakaki wants me to hold her hand. I could just die." Kaorin thought. Working her way across Sakaki as best she could with a bloated body and puffy limbs Kaorin managed to grab Sakaki's left with her right just as her body started to absorb her limbs.
"I can too change people watch,” says Tomo "Ahem. I command that Chio-Chan be inflated!"
1231311.title: Someone's getting an inflated ego.

choices: Kagura next for a full set.
Everyone starts to inflate, wait Osaka isn't doing it!
12313111.content:
Tomo's enthusiasm affects Osaka too "Yes Chio-chan must be inflated" and not a minute sooner a little ball of Chio started to float towards the group
"I don't believe it." sighed Yomi.
"Wha-What’s happening?" whimpered Chio-chan cutely making Sakaki blush and Kaorin glare.
"I made you big and puffy!" exclaimed Tomo with a grin.
"bu-but that’s not possible." stammered Chio.
"Sure it is," said Tomo " and it's all thanks to me!"
"I hate to say it but it seems Tomo is right,” explained Yomi "mine as well enjoy it."
"Ok but now what?" said Chio still not sure what is going on but starting to enjoy it.
12313111.title: Chio appears and Tomo claims credit.

123131112.content:
"Now we get bigger!" Yelled Tomo and as the group floated higher into the air each started to grow bigger. There bodies not able to absorb anything more just grow larger
"oooh where like balloons that where let go." sighed Kaorin holding Sakaki's hand tightly as there bodies pressed together.
"Oh! Chio-chan I wanted to ask you, what happens to balloons after they start to float up high?" Asked Osaka. "Cus if they start a city up here I thought we could visit."
Chio sweat drops " Well because of the difference in atmospheric pressure will make the gasses in it to expand until the balloon eventually explodes."
"Oh." said Osaka and then thinks, "That must be why we’re inflating even though I'm not doing it."
"Your not going to let us burst are you?" asked Yomi flatly
"Maybe." said Tomo with a big smile
"DON'T JOKE ABOUT SOMETHING LIKE THAT!" Yelled Yomi in outrage.
"Hmmm or maybe it is Tomo who is controlling it now."
123131112.title: Is it scientific or MAGIC?

1231311121.content:
"I'm serious Tomo stop the inflation before someone gets hurt." said Yomi
"Fine THE GREAT TOMO COMANDS THE INFLATION STOPS."
... "ooooh where not stopping" groaned Yomi "maybe it really wasn’t you after all."
"awww man I was gona have fun with it too." wined Tomo.
"Wait so does that mean that we really are going to." started Kaorin "Pop?" finished Sakaki.
"Sounds like fun." exclaimed Osaka
"That’s what I thought." said Tomo. "But noooo miss blubber over there wants me to waist my gift stopping inflation."
"You don't have a gift and we are going to die!" Yelled Yomi.
"Calm down enjoy it not like we can do much anyway."
1231311121.title: Realization and panic well sort of..

12313111212.content:
"She's right" sighed Sakaki "We might as well enjoy it."
"If Sakaki-san is alright with it then I am too " Said Kaorin firmly "Thanks Kaorin." said Sakaki smiling *Creeeeaaaak* 'Um, Sakaki-San, could you call me Kaori?" "Sure Kaori," replied Sakaki "I could just die...ahhhhh" they both moaned and with that...

*BOOM*

Both Kaorin and Sakaki exploded
"Wow that was awesome! I wanna see Chiyo pop next!" exclaimed Tomo
"Actually I think I'm next." groaned Yomi as her body did the same "ah. Ah. AHHHHH"

*BANG*

Yomi burst. "Nice job Yomi." said Osaka cheerfully.
"Ya that big body of yours really went boom!" shouted Tomo.
"OOOH pay attention I'm next" wailed Chiyo.

*BLAM*

Chiyo popped "Wow Chiyo made a big blast for being so small." Exclaimed Osaka
"Hay Osaka lets race whoever pops first wins!" shouted Tomo
"Then didn't Kaorin win?"
"What no!" *creaaaaaak*
"Oh so it was Sakaki who won!"
*Groaaan*
"No I win!"

*KA BLAMO*

Tomo blew apart. "maybe I can still save them" thought Osaka.
12313111212.title: Boom Bang Blam Ka Blamo!

123131112122.content:
"Nope"
*POP*

Osaka sat up suddenly. "Stop it Tomo! We need those balloons for Chiyo's birthday!" yelled Yomi.
*POW* "Ha ha come and get me! You need the exercise!"

"Oh it was just a dream," said Osaka "It was a nice dream."
123131112122.title: Back to normal.

1231311122.content:
Osaka smiles. "Actually, right now she can. See, I had the power first but I decided to transfer it to Tomo since she seems to know what to do with it." Osaka explains. "So yeah, Tomo is in control now."

"Hehehe...see, I told you I had the power!" exclaims Tomo.

Yomi sighs. "Only after Osaka gave you said power." she says, before suddenly fwoomping up three times larger. "Ack! Tomo!"

"Don't talk back to someone who can make you puff up at the drop of a hat." taunts Tomo, poking at Yomi a bit as she flaps her practically useless hands. "Now, who to pick on next..."
1231311122.title: Tomo is in control.

choices: She suspects someone who hasn't joined them yet.
12313112.content:
Of course, Osaka isn't really paying attention to Tomo. "Gee, Tomo sure is worked up about this...maybe she really likes this...I think I'll make her bigger..." Osaka thinks as she starts imagining Tomo bigger than she was before. But she imagines her being that big without actually thinking about her inflating to that size, so to everyone's surprise Tomo suddenly fwoomps outward, nearly twice as wide as she was just a moment ago.

"Wah! I said Chiyo-chan should inflate, not me!" Tomo shouts while Yomi giggles a little.

"Heh, you certainly showed us, Tomo." says Yomi. "Just admit it, you're along for the ride just like the rest of us."

Tomo smirks a bit. "Maybe, but I have a feeling that the source of this isn't too far away..." she says, already having someone in mind.
12313112.title: Deflate that ego with something unexpected!

choices: Reveal herself and give Yomi some say.
Stay in the shadows giving Yomi no say.
1231312.content:
“Hmmm it’s not safe to be small up here” thought Osaka “but they look so happy together” “Hmmmm” she said out loud “I got it” and she started thinking.
Tomo is still in the background chanting “make her bigger! Make her bigger!” While Yomi is watching with a raised eyebrow as Kaorin started to sink into Sakaki’s body. “Ah Miss Sakaki are you deflating?!?” asked Kaorin worried for Sakaki and her own safety. But to everyone else it was just the opposite Sakaki seemed to be growing, however although Sakaki was growing Kaorin was no longer on top of Sakaki per say. Kaorin looked down and at her arms and noticed that they seemed be in Sakaki’s body but when she tried to pull them out she couldn’t in fact she couldn’t move any of her aside from her head. “Sakaki?” she asked half afraid half aroused at what was happening. By now Tomo had stopped chanting to stair in awe. Before them floats a supper puffed up Sakaki but beside Sakaki’s head sat Kaorin’s both a deep shade of red.
“That’s Awesome! Lets do that too!” Tomo shouted looking over at Yomi.
Yomi sweet drops “ I hope not.” She said “ although given the way things or going its not like I would have much choice.”

should Osaka-
1231312.title: It's safe to stick together.

choices: Make herself a ball of fat too.
1232.content:
The moment the thought crosses Osaka's mind, both Tomo and Yomi shout as they see each other starting to bloat up. However, instead of looking like they're gaining weight through fat, the two girls look like they are actually being inflated with the substance instead, which is really what Osaka has in her mind. They are inflating in such a way that every part of them up to their wrists, ankles, and necks are swelling out all at once, every moment of it making them look more round, until both of them are as round as they can get.

Tomo blinks. "Wh...what just happened...?"

Yomi isn't sure what to think, on one hand, this is way beyond ordinary, but on the other hand, it almost seems like Karma had kicked in, even if they both ended up the way they are. And on the other, other hand, Tomo isn't likely to let her live this down. She eventually just huffs in a disgruntled manner while she wiggles her hands and feet a bit.

"Hehe, do you like it? Now you're nice big balls of fat!" says Osaka after a moment of silence, startling the two of them.

"Bwah? Wait, did you have something to do with this, Osaka?" asks Tomo.

Osaka nods. "Mmmhum, now you won't be able to make fun of each other and you can both be happy now!" she explains.

Yomi raises an eyebrow. "How exactly were you able to do this to us?" she asks.

With that, Osaka explains how she can make things happen using onlly her mind. Tomo lights up a little. Yomi is rather shocked, considering the implications of Osaka with the power to make her thoughts a reality.

"Now...what to do with you two..." Osaka wonders, as she looks them over...
1232.title: Butterballs

choices: Something normal like sweets or spicy food.
Something big fat and right next to me!
12323.content:
Osaka walks over to Tomo and gentaly pushes on her.

"Ahhh you're so soft Tomo. I wana be soft too." no sooner does Osaka says this then does she start growing in the same way the others had. "Feels good so warm."

as Osaka reached her full size she lightly bumps into Tomo who in turn lightly taps Yomi. Each of the girls shiver their spherical bodies jiggling as a wave of pleasure washed over them.

"Were so close right now we must look like dango*." commented Osaka to which Yomi's stomach gave a reply "Growl Gurggle." Yomi's face turned read

"Ha sounds like someone skipped breakfast." Laughed Tomo. To which Yomi reply "I was just trying to watch my weight by eating a little less."

"Ya well you don't have to worry about that anymore we can eat whatever we want now that we look like this" Tomo said

"Yep I can probably make food with my ability and if not I could give myself the ability to make food with my ability so tell me what you want Yomi and I'll make sure you get it." explained Osaka

"Anything I want huh" said Yomi a look of hunger in her eyes as she imagined what she could eat now that it doesn't matter much. " Alright I want..."

* dango is a Japanese dumpling made from rice flower most of the time its three or four spheres on a skewer.
12323.title: Make herself a ball of fat too.

choices: Roll Yomi into the cake so she'll stop worrying about pacing.
Eat the cake along with Yomi even though it's just for her.
123232.content:
"...something really huge, practically as big as I am right now. And close enough for me to eat it, of course." says Yomi, her glasses fogging over a bit as she does so.

Tomo laughs a bit. "Geez, you're really gonna go all out all out like that? Would this be a bit of your true colors showing, hum?" she asks, leaning against Yomi a bit.

Yomi blushes a little, which causes her glasses to fog over even more. "Well, maybe just a little. Being as fat as I am now helps, though."

Osaka giggles, and nods. "Oh yes, we could just get bigger and bigger and bigger..." Osaka says, which causes them to fill for a few moments before Osaka catches herself. "But yeah...how about a huge cake?" As Osaka says this, there's suddenly a huge cake the same size as Yomi right next to her. "And your body will make every bite of it into fat once it's inside you, so you'll grow bigger while you eat."

"Wow...it looks delicious...and it's all for me?" Yomi asks, as she looks it over.

Osaka smiles. "Mmmhum, and don't even worry about getting too full, because I made it so we can't."

This announcement causes Yomi to blink a bit, still looking over the cake. "Ah...but I already feel full as is...though not so full I can't eat." she says, preparing to eat the cake.

"Yeah, it wouldn't be any fun if we didn't feel like we were becoming more full...but you'll only feel comfortably full." Osaka explains.

Yomi smiles a little. "Wow...that sounds, well, really nice. Alright, I think I'll get started, then." Yomi says, as she starts eating the cake. Indeed, she does feel herself getting more full with each bite. Yomi is being careful not to fall into the cake, which is causing her to grow larger at a slow but steady rate, which is starting to grate on Tomo's patience. Besides, Tomo wants to do more than just watch...
123232.title: Giant food? Sure, why not?

choices: Make Yomi A delicious cake which must be eaten.
1232321.content:
"Yomi you're so slow! Eat it faster!" Tomo shouted. Yomi stops a moment to turn her head and look at tomo " It's not a race I'll take my time savoring this delicious treat, Osaka so graciously provided for me." with a nod to Osaka she turned back and went back to eating slowly, possibly even slower then before.

Truth be told Yomi wanted to jump into the middle of it and eat it as fast as possible but two things where stopping her, one she didn't know how she'd be able to maneuver while in the cake, it's hard enough to lean just enough to get to it without tipping over, and two she's haveing fun annoying Tomo and if theres something that annoys Tomo more then losing its people who go to slow.

"Hay Osaka" whispered Tomo "Could ya turn me back to normal real quick I wanna try something" wondering what Tomo was going to do Osaka imagined her back to her normal size. Tomo's body quickly receded back to it's original shape strangely enough her cloths returned as well without being stretched or anything.

Tomo clenched her fists in joy looking ready to shout, but decided better, turned to face Osaka put a finger to her mouth then ran off behind Yomi.

Yomi who by now had increased her size slightly notice she wasn't rubbing against Tomo anymore and that she had become strangely quiet. Yomi stopped and looked to the gap where Tomo had once been only seeing Osaka on the other side

"Where did Tomo go?" Asked Yomi. Osaka not sure what to say turned her head to look in the direction Tomo ran in. Soon though it wouldn't matter because Tomo could be heard dashing back towards them.

"TOOOREEE-YAAAA!" Tomo shouted followed by a loud *SMACK* as she ran head first into Yomi's backside, bounced off and landed on the ground, barely moving Yomi forward even an inch.

"Watch it you could hurt someone!" shouted Yomi although it seemed unlikely with their enormous padding. Not one to give up Tomo quickly stood up and started pushing up on Yomi's large body rolling her forward slightly.

"Wait Tomo STO-" Yomi shouted as she went head first into the delicious cake her faced pressed down into it and Yomi took this chance to inhale as much cake as she could but had to stop soon as her face became the lowest thing on her body, but it was only for a short time as soon she could see an upside down Tomo looking slightly worried and standing away as Yomi's moved back upright and then back down.

"TO---MO---YOU-----BA-----KA!" Yomi yelled as she rolled out of control covered in icing and cake until she ran into a wall and bounced back slightly leaving a noticeable dent.

Tomo and Osaka, both concerned, rushed over to the dazed Yomi. Osaka forgetting she was still a ball quickly returned to normal without noticing,

" Are you ok?" asked Osaka slightly frantic Yomi's head still spinning replied "I'll~ Smash ~ ya ~ flat." Seeing Yomi fine relieved the two and allowed Tomo to return to taunting.

"Geeze Yomi I knew ya wanted that cake but ya sure made a huge mess, there's so much icing and cake on you You're practically a cake yourself!" with that Tomo took some icing off with her finger and licked it.

"hmmm Those are both good ideals but which is better?" Osaka asked none in particular looking far off and nowhere at the same time.
1232321.title: Recking ball Yomi!

choices: Give then a chance to talk.
Have them fill in an enclosed space, such as a pool.
1233.content:
Suddenly, Tomo and Yomi start to feel a cool sensation starting from the middle of their bodies, as well as a decent amount of pressure, both outward and downward. They also notice that the area around their midsections are starting to bloat out and down. "Oh...oh god...this isn't happening..." Yomi says, as she looks around to find a possible source of this phenomena, her fluid-filled midsection sloshing with each movement.

As for Tomo, she's poking herself a bit. "Oooh...I look like I'm turning into a water balloon!" she exclaims, and indeed, as they continue to fill up, their bodies start to press down towards their feet. They can also feel their legs start to expand along with the lower part of their bodies. Once that part of their body is rounded out down to their feet, the fluid they're filling up with starts to spread upwards. By this point, they find they are unable to move due to the water weighting them down.

"W-wah, how can you be so cheerful about this, Tomo? I mean, why is this even happening?" asks Yomi, who physically isn't as far as long as Tomo due to being the taller of the two. The two are starting to look less like people and more like large water beds with a human head attached to the middle, as the water forces their bodies to appear shorter to the ground, practically cutting their height in half. This, however, means that they're at least around 8 feet wide.

Tomo has a wide grin on her face. "Awesome! I've become my own bed! And I'm a water bed, to boot!" she says. "A lot better than just a water balloon, don't you think?"

"And it doesn't worry you how it happened all of a sudden!?" snaps Yomi, not quite seeing the appeal yet.

And then Osaka walks up to them. "Hi, it was me." says Osaka, as if this was completely normal. "Now what to do next..."
1233.title: Water Beds

124.content:
"Hmm..."Osaka thought, "Those two are so wrought up at times. Tomo is having fun poking Yomi but Yomi doesn't like it. What can I do? Maybe I can make them both squishy or something..."

Osaka smiled as she thought up of what she could do to help her troubled peers.

"I could make Tomo and Yomi both happy if I change their bodies with my new power!"she grinned, "But how? ... "
124.title: Squishing Options

1242.content:
"Maybe they both can become super squishy!" Osaka thought.

Osaka smiled an irregular and mischievous smile as she thought of Yomi and Tomo's new bodies.

"Argh! Will you stop doing that!" Yomi shouted. Tomo ignored Yomi and continued to prod her body. "You keep on poking me and yet you never get tired." said Yomi, "How would you like it if I poked you?!"

Yomi forced her index finger into Tomo's belly. "Oof!" Tomo grunted. "Huh?" Yomi noticed something unusual about Tomo. With her other hand, Yomi reached around Tomo's back and felt that part of it was forcibly push out in a rough shape of Yomi's finger and part of her hand. Tomo reached to where Yomi was reaching to investigate on her own.

"Ack! How did you do that?!" Tomo cried. "I don't know..." Yomi uttered as she pulled her finger away allowing Tomo's body to return to normal. Tomo pushed her own finger into Yomi's body. "Hey!" Yomi yelled. Her back contorted in a similar fashion. "Hey, you can do that to me too." said Yomi. Tomo released her hand and Yomi's back returned to normal.

"Hmm... Let me try something..." says Yomi. Before Tomo could say anything Yomi wrapped both her hands around the middle of Tomo's torso and squeezed her hands together. Tomo stood in shock as she saw her body squish together in Yomi's hands as though she was nothing more than modeling clay. Her seemingly boneless mid-torso was easily compressed to a two-inch diameter.

"Wow..." Yomi gasped as she let go of Tomo's torso, "We've become living putty!" "B-b-but h-how?" Tomo stuttered. Her body remained squished for a couple of minutes until returning to its normal state.

"Cool! It worked!" Osaka thought, "Now what?"
1242.title: Living Putty

choices: All of them do what Osaka just did.
Mess around with being able to mold and shape each other.
12421.content:
"It sure looks like fun...ah! I think I'll try it too!" says Osaka, as she imagines herself with a body made of putty. By this time, Tomo and Yomi's eyes are on Osaka, but like with them they don't really notice the difference right off the bat.

To show off that she really is made of putty, she makes her body form into a 'puddle', or rather, she lets gravity do the work for her. Tomo and Yomi watch on as Osaka's form becomes less humanoid and more dome-like. The upper parts of her body stretch and spread out as they touch the dome-like portion of her body, losing definition as they do and eventually forming into a even, solid mass. Eventually, there is no way to even tell that Osaka was ever a human, as she is simply a large mass of spreading putty.

Yomi finds herself without words, while Tomo curiously pokes the mass of putty, hardly able to believe that it was still Osaka. As if to confirm, Osaka wobbles a little, and then giggles. After a few more moments, Osaka reforms herself, starting with the top of her head and going down. "Hehe, now all three of us are putty girls!" exclaims Osaka.

Tomo grins, as her mind finally adjusts to her new form. "Ooh, we could have a LOT of fun like this!" she exclaims, as she wonders what to do first.
12421.title: Osaka joins them

choices: Put all three of them into a round tub.
See how far they can spread out.
124211.content:
Tomo grins, having something in mind already. "Hey, why don't we do what Osaka just did, only all at once?" she asks even though she doesn't particularly care what Yomi thinks. Osaka is already in the middle of melting into a puddle, having already spaced out.

"Ah, that sounds fun, sure!" Osaka exclaims, still forming into a puddle of putty. Tomo doesn't so much relax herself into the proper shape as she does squish herself down. As she does, she and Osaka seem to become one large puddle. Yomi just sweatdrops, not really wanting to have any part of this. At the same time, though, she doesn't really want to be left out. So after a few tries, both she and her form start to relax. It's at this point that Yomi notices that there is something oddly relaxing about melting into a puddle.

"I don't know how...but this is pretty comfortable..." she says, relaxed to the point where it doesn't take too long for her to join the puddle that Osaka and Tomo have formed, just a few moments after Osaka's form has completely relaxed.

Of course, there's more fun that could be had with this...
124211.title: All of them do what Osaka just did.

choices: Have someone else do the molding.
124212.content:
Yomi scratches her head, having enough control to keep herself from sticking together when one part of her body comes in contact with another. "And what exactly do you have in mind?"

Tomo grins, and coils her arm around Yomi. "Just look at us, we're all so stretchy and squishy, we can do anything we can imagine with our bodies now!" Tomo explains. "No matter how impossible it'd normally be...something like...this!" As she says this, Tomo grabs both of her legs by the ankle, and starts pulling her body into two halves, at least up to her torso. As she does this, her arms stretch with her legs and eventually merge with them. She causes them to curl around behind her, and wraps them around each other a few times before bringing both ends to rest on either side of her head. It would seem Tomo has made herself into a human pretzel, only much more literally.

"Heh, impressive, right?" asks Tomo.

Osaka happily claps while Yomi raises an eyebrow. "Ok...this is getting really weird now..." says Yomi, as she looks her altered friend over.

"Yeah, it really is, isn't it great!?" Tomo asks as she shifts her head to the top of her pretzel-shaped body. "And we're just getting started, too! So, why don't we see what you guys can become?"
124212.title: Tomo the Pretzel.

choices: ...Make her a little girl like Chio!" (age regression)
Make her a kitty cat!"(animal transformation)
Make her a cat girl!"(partial animal transformation)
14.content: Osaka saw Sakaki walking in the direction of Chio's house. Sakaki always liked to walk with Chio even though she had to backtrack to get to school. "Great I'll change Sakaki, but into what." Osaka says to herself looking thoughtful. "Well she's always wants to be cute I know I'll...
14.title: Sakaki

choices: Maybe age isn't the issue. (Less matured without the age drop)
141.content: Okay Chiyo's age exactly or younger?
141.title: ...Make her a little girl like Chio!" (age ...

1413.content: "Oh...actually, maybe making her younger isn't the only thing I can do...she'd probably be cuter if she wasn't so tall and developed..." Osaka says, as she starts to imagine a less-mature Sakaki.
1413.title: Same Age, Less Mature

14132.content:
However, Osaka being the way she is, when she thinks 'less mature', she starts to get sidetracked and imagines Sakaki as she is right now, only acting more like a child.

Meanwhile, Sakaki comes to a complete halt as her mind starts to get altered to what Osaka has in mind. The question now is, what is Osaka considering as 'less mature'
14132.title: The Mind of a Child

choices: Apply cartoon physics to the entire world.
141322.content:
At first, nothing seems to be all that different about Sakaki. Sakaki just shakes her head and moves along. Osaka decides to tail Sakaki to see if she actually changed Sakaki in any way. She does seem to note that Sakaki looks around more wondrously than she normally would. However, what seems to catch her eye is an unattended and seemingly abandoned steamroller. "Ah, I wonder what would make someone leave a perfectly good steamroller here. Hum..." she says, poking around with the controls a bit, which causes it to start up on it's own. "Oh, it works too...I wonder..." she says, as she tosses her satchel aside and lays down in front of it. "Maybe it can squish me like on TV..." she says, not seeming to realize such a thing might be fatal.

'Oh, she seems to be as curious as a young child...it might be fun if she couldn't be harmed...and "like on TV" just gave me a fun idea!' Osaka thinks to herself.
141322.title: Dangerously curious.

1413222.content:
What Osaka has in mind is not just life as if it was a cartoon, but rather, life as a cartoon. In a flash of Osaka's imagination, the whole world starts becoming bright and colorful, and people start to become super-deformed and cartoon-like. Osaka notices that she and Sakaki have become chibified versions of themselves. 'Oh, it worked! Everything's all cartoony now!' Osaka thinks. Sakaki, however, is too occupied with seeing the results of being ran over by a steamroller, and by now, the sound of Sakaki slowly being pressed flat can be hear as the steamroller starts flattening her cartoonishly large feet. "Ah, it's working...and wow, since when were my feet that big..." she says, looking herself over and realizing she has the proportions of a cartoon character. "Ah, nice..." she says non-sarcastically, thinking her current form is more cute than the way she normally is. "I wonder why, though..." she asks, as Osaka steps forward to claim responsibility.

"Ah, is being flattened working out for you, Sakaki-san?" Osaka asks as if things like this are normal.

Sakaki blinks, and notices the steamroller's gotten to her waist by now. "Ah, it seems so...do you have any idea what is going on, anyway?" she asks, to which Osaka nods.

"I made everything like a cartoon. Isn't it nice, now you can be flattened easily!" Osaka exclaims. "I got the power to make anything happen this morning." she says. Sakaki has no problem believing this, considering she's squashed up to her head by now. She tries to say something, but she gets muffled as the steamroller begins pressing her head flat. Once the second roller has gone over her, Sakaki manages to peel herself off the ground, wobbling a little as she does. "Ah...well, now that I'm flat...I wonder if this will work." She says, as she presses her lips against one of her thumbs and blows into it. Sure enough, this causes Sakaki to begin swelling back up to her normal size.

Now that she realizes she can do anything with minimal harm, Sakaki really feels like experimenting now. "Ah, I'm not sure where to start, but I want to do something else now..."
1413222.title: Make everything into a cartoon.

choices: She picks a different cat-type instead
143.content:
Osaka immediately began to imagine what a cat version of Sakaki would looklike

'It'd be boring if she couldn't talk, but she'd definately be a black cat.' Osaka thought.

As this happened Sakaki felt herself fall onto all fours and her clothes dissapeared. She felt her hair become fur and spread over her body as a tail grew. The transformation was nearly completed when Osaka had another idea.

'But what if she was a panther...that'd be cool'


Sakaki's body then grew larger and a bit more ferocious.

'But is a panther cute...? Oh I can't decide!' Osaka thought, eventually she decided on...
143.title: Make her a kitty cat!"(animal transformation)

choices: Makes her into a Panther Cub
Returns her to normal, but as a panther-type catgirl.
Can't do anything as Sakaki is captured by animal control.
1432.content:
Without a mirror, Sakaki can't quite tell what kind of cat she is, all she know is that she is one. 'Ah...maybe like this they won't run...' she thinks as she decides to go off in search of some cats, not realizing that Osaka has decided to make her into a panther. Curious, Osaka decides to follow her.

Sakaki does note that she's quite large for being a cat, but she's still determined to see if the local cats will be more accepting of her. Of course, the moment she comes across a small group of them, they all seem to tense up in fear of her. Being Sakaki, she tries to slowly approach them, only to have them run off soon after. "Ah! Don't run!" she exclaims, though the sound of a human coming from a much larger cat doesn't help matters at all.

"Ah...no good..." Sakaki says, as she lays down on the ground.

'She might be a big cat, but she's still Sakaki on the inside.' Osaka thinks as Sakaki sulks.

Suddenly, Sakaki's ears perk up, as she can hear someone approaching. Osaka also just realizes someone seeing a big cat like Sakaki in broad daylight might cause alarm.
1432.title: As a Panther

choices: Wanted to see if Chiyo wanted to change too
Kagura comes in from practically nowhere
144.content:
Soon Osaka ran over to Sakaki and decided to ask permission 1st.

"Hey Osaka!" Sakaki said quietly,but in a strong voice.

"Hey Sakaki, can I ask you a question?"

"Sure."

"Okay do you think Cat-girls are cute?" Osaka asked. Sakaki blushed a bit before responding.

"Umm..I would think so."

"Okay, then if you could be one would you want to?" Osaka may have imagined it but the tall girl might've beamed upon responding.

"Yes, that'd be nice."

Needing no further urging, Osaka began to imagine Sakaki with cat ears and a tail, and as she thought about it the changes happened to a surprised Sakaki.

"Whoa, is this really happening?" Sakaki said pulling on her now catlike ears.

"Yeah, do you like it?" Osaka asked

Sakaki said Yes and...
144.title: Make her a cat girl!"(partial animal transf...

choices: Make her look like a cute animal mascot. (Unusual expansion/body manipulation)
Make her into a plush toy of some kind. (Object Transformation)
Make her helpless in some fashion. Helplessness is cute, right?
145.content: Osaka took a moment to think. As interesting as those ideas were, her powers gave her more freedom than that. Surely, there was something more fun she could do.
145.title: (Something crazy and off the wall)!

choices: Some combination of inflated head, feet, hands, and body.
Waddling head-like, with stubby arms and legs.
Make her all Super Deformed, while maintaining her current size.
1451.content: "Hehehe...a lot of those animal mascots in sports are cute...but I can do better than putting her in a costume..." Osaka thinks, as she wonders about what kind of mascot she'll make Sakaki into.
1451.title: Mascot Sakaki

choices: Inflate everything except for her head.
Start with head inflation to start with.
14511.content: "Oooh...I bet making her puffy all over would make her look really nice..." Osaka thinks, as she's prepared to do something to Sakaki at this point.
14511.title: Puffy Mascot Girl Sakaki

145111.content:
Osaka begins to think of what Sakaki would look like if her whole body was puffed up all over. She imagines Sakaki with puffed feet, puffed hands, a round body...but she seems more amused when she imagines Sakaki's head being no bigger than it usually is. Of course, now that Osaka has a mental picture of it, it's only a matter of moments before Sakaki's body will begin to change.

Meanwhile, Sakaki is completely unaware of what is about to happen to her. Her first sign that something isn't quite right is the sudden sensation of pressure in her hands, feet, and mid-section. "Ah...this feels odd..." Sakaki says, as she first looks down to see her feet and mid-section are swelling up, and looks to her hands to find the same thing is happening to them. She looks rather surprised, but that's about all. "Oh, what...what's happening to me?" she says, as she continues to swell up. She can feel the pressure in her midsection spreading out to her torso and waist, and then her arms and legs. Sakaki blushes, as this is causing her to stand out a lot more than she normally does. Though she does notice that this doesn't seem to be hurting her at all or causing discomfort, especially once her feet burst out of her shoes and socks.

By the time Sakaki's body was finished swelling, it had a rather cartoon-ish appearance. Her body was swollen as wide as she was tall, and her puffed feet added quite a bit to her height. Her feet look as if they're a pair of small beds attached to her body by her ankles, and her hands look like the kind of gloved hand a cartoon character would have.

At this point, Osaka shows herself. "What do you think, Sakaki? I thought this look would make you look really cute." says Osaka.

A little surprised that Osaka somehow caused this to happen, Sakaki blinks for a bit, then blushes. "Oh...you...really think so? I mean...I thought so too, but to hear someone else say it..." she manages to say, blushing a little more.

Osaka gives a quick nod. "Mmmhum, wouldn't have done it to you if I didn't think it would help." she says. "I'm glad you like it, Sakaki."

Sakaki blushes again, realizing that while she never outright said she liked it, it does seem rather enjoyable. "Oh, yes...it's really different...but it does feel really nice..." she says, wiggling her puffy toes just a bit.

Osaka smiles. "So, do you want to be bigger, then?"
145111.title: Inflate everything except for her head.

choices: Make her assets much too large to move. (Breast and/or butt inflation.)
Inflate her until she's large and round.
Fatten her until she can't move.
1453.content: Osaka thought for a moment more. "Hum...maybe she'd like being in some condition where someone else would have to take care of her..."
1453.title: Making Sakaki into a pet.

info.brief_description: Ayumu "Osaka" Kasuga gets the power to manipulate herself and others. What will happen?
info.description:
Welcome to my Azumanga-based interactive. In this story, Ayumu "Osaka" Kasuga will be using her newly obtained power to alter people to play around with herself and/or her friends. What you'll be deciding is who she'll start out messing with and by what means she'll do that.

There's only two rules to keep in mind:
1) Osaka is the main character, but you are allowed to switch away from her if you give proper warning regarding this.

2) No guro for the sake of being guro. It is only allowed if it's part of a transformation, but don't go into great detail about it, and try to split the story so that content like that can be steered away from.

Beyond that, anything goes for the most part. If I don't like something I won't outright delete it but I will prod you about it if I can.
